attributes.action: This House Believes That The GCSE and A-Level Examination System Should Be Scrapped, And Replaced With An Officialy, Professionally Marked Coursework.
attributes.additional_details: This house believes that all examinations achieve is to uncover the ability of the examinee to work under an immense deal of pressure and stress. We believe that if coursework (marked by professionals) were to take its place, a much greater view would be gained upon the student's true ability within every given subject.
